source.subject: Order No, 50000109772
source.body:
HI,

Is it possible to have someone call me please on 07488271340 to discuss an order that was placed but still hasn’t yet been received.

Kind Regards

Natalie

Natalie Ludlow
Support Co-ordinator

conversation_parts.body: Hi Natalie, when did you place the order? Do you have the order reference?

Hi Dan,

It was placed 31st January for Cherry Tree House, it was for 2 hand sets and a pack of 25 quick close tags, I only have my order reference from Agresso which is 50000109772, I have an external reference name on there of Ryan Knight.

Kind regards

Natalie

Natalie Ludlow
Support Co-ordinator
Office:
www.communityintegratedcare.co.uk
